tasks.label: Install Dev Deps
tasks.command: python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && (pip install -r requirements.txt || true) && pip install streamlit plotly pandas requests python-dotenv pydantic jsonschema

windows.command: python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\activate && pip install --upgrade pip && (pip install -r requirements.txt || echo Continuing with individual packages) && pip install streamlit plotly pandas requests python-dotenv pydantic jsonschema

tasks.detail: Creates venv and installs all dependencies (requirements.txt + streamlit packages)

tasks.label: Run: Automation Runner (Dry-Run)
tasks.command: . venv/bin/activate && export DRY_RUN=true && export BROKER_NAME=binance && export BINANCE_BASE_URL=https://testnet.binance.vision && python automation/runner.py

windows.command: .\venv\Scripts\activate && set DRY_RUN=true && set BROKER_NAME=binance && set BINANCE_BASE_URL=https://testnet.binance.vision && python automation/runner.py

tasks.detail: Runs automation runner in DRY_RUN mode (no API keys required)

tasks.label: Run: View Session (Streamlit)
tasks.detail: Starts Streamlit View Session on port 8501
